Public parking, many motorhomes use this place to spend the night. max. 72 hours.
NO CAMPING! (chairs, tables etc.)
water tap near the kiosko at the beach 40 meters from carpark (also has showers)
Next to the visitor center.

title: (38800) San Sebastián de La Gomera -

title: (38800) San Sebastián de La Gomera - 76 Calle Real
title_short: (38800) San Sebastián de La Gomera - 76 Calle Real
description: Full service laundry in the center of San Sebastian, close to Columbus' old home. Your laundry is washed, dried and folded. For this you pay something extra than going to the launderette yourself. Bring it in the morning, then you can pick it up the same day.

title: (38800) San Sebastián de La Gomera - 14 Travesía General Tf 713 Segunda
title_short: (38800) San Sebastián de La Gomera - 14 Travesía General Tf 713 Segunda

title_short: (38800) San Sebastián de La Gomera - 1 Avenida José Aguiar

title: (38801) San Sebastián de La Gomera -
description: A flat space for parking in the curve, lovely pebble beach for sunrises in 500m (parking down there is not permitted according to the infocharts). Not far from San Sebastian, ideal for the first night if you take the evening ferry in and appreciate solitude.

title: (38811) - 22 Calle Jerduñe

title: (38811) San Sebastián de La Gomera - GM-3

title: (38811) San Sebastián de La Gomera - 60 Calle Playa Santiago

title: (38811) San Sebastián de La Gomera - GM-2

title: (38813) Alajeró - GM-3

title: (38890) Hermigua - 16 Calle el Cedro
description: Nice place in the middle of a Laurisilva forest, in the El Cedro camp, the parking lot with several spaces is relatively flat and level, the road is narrow, full of routes and trails to explore and with a picnic area with several tables.

title: (38829) Hermigua - Unnamed Road
description: A discreet path leads to a dam. On this road (the best dirt road) there are many lumps to sleep on. We could spend two nights there in peace. Only suitable for campers who do not need electricity, water, etc. in the place. A place only to recommend. The only drawback: it is difficult to turn, but it is possible with a maximum of 7 meters. (No problem for experienced drivers :)).

title: (38890) Hermigua - 41 Calle el Cedro

title: (38810) Alajeró - 65 Carretera Santiago Alajeró

title: (38813) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 203 Calle Alajero
title_short: (38813) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 203 Calle Alajero
description: Beautiful gravel site. The one behind the cemetery below the airfield. But where there is very little air traffic. You can head there for a good night's sleep. Beautiful view.  Mobile homes don't have to drive straight ahead at the cemetery to the left at the wall! only for normal motorhomes not xxl. If you have a four-wheel drive you can drive further to the cliff.  Beautiful sunsets. Peace and love.

title: (38820) Hermigua - 48 Carretera de Lepe

title: (38869) Igualero - Unnamed Road

title: (38830) Agulo - 41 Calle Lepe

title: (38812) Alajeró - Calle de la Roseta

title: (38812) Alajeró - Calle Ancón de Luis
description: At the foot of the hill on which the Ermita de San Isidro stands is a gravel / asphalt place with no facilities. Most of the course is flat and has a fantastic view. The last 300m of the driveway are narrow, but clearly visible.

title: (38830) Agulo - 116 TF-711
description: In Agulo there is hardly a place to stay with the motorhome. A few hundred meters to the center on foot.

title: (38830) Agulo - 2A Carretera General
description: Parking without limitation, very quiet town, although stations next to the road, not many cars usually pass at night,

title: (38812) Imada -

title: (38890) Agulo - Calle de la Palmita
description:
Car park of the mirador de Abrante. Toilets are open, when the mirador is open. Martes a Domingo de 10 a 16.
Lunes closed.

title: (38830) Agulo - 79A Callejón el Charco Primera
description: Public car park on the edge of the village. Very quiet location. Beautiful view of Tenerife with the Teide. Located directly near the municipal works, this looks a bit messy but does not cause any nuisance. Flat terrain. It is a few minutes walk to the supermarket. There are no further facilities in the car park.

title: (38890) Agulo - Carretera Laguna Grande

title: (38890) Agulo - 1989 Calle de la Palmita
description: Public parking.

title: (38869) Chipude -

title: (38849) Rosas de las Piedras - 349 Calle Rosa de las Piedras

title: (38869) La Dehesa - CV 17

title: (38891) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 66 Calle Vallehermoso

description: Barbecue area and picnic area with playground.

title: (38891) Vallehermoso - 58 TF-712

title: (38860) Vallehermoso - 1 Calle la Rajita
description: Quiet place with beach a chiringuito in summer

title: (38869) Vallehermoso - Calle Verodal
description: Hermitage of Guará. We spent one night in a van. There are no services. Nice views.

title: (38892) Valle Gran Rey - Unnamed Road
description: Place with a great view. Four-wheel drive not absolutely necessary! At about 1000hm it can get pretty cool and windy. No service, please take everything back with you or more, so that the place stays as beautiful as it is and everyone can enjoy parking for longer! Respect nature!

title: (38850) Arguamul -
description: Attention access for small 4x4 vehicle only! in front of the Ermita Santa Clara, magnificent watchtower and departure point for hikes. Barbecue and picnic table. there are little cats who don't seem to eat much if you can bring them a few things ❤️ Wake up with the roosters

title: (38892) Valle Gran Rey - Camino el Sobrado
title_short: (38892) Valle Gran Rey - Camino el Sobrado
description: Parking for hikes. There are supply options in Arure. Parking for hikers. The car park is not suitable for large vehicles as there is no turning facility. ol place with a gigantic view of the Valley of the Kings for 1-2 nights.

title: (38870) Valle Gran Rey - 3 Calle el Carmen
title_short: (38870) Valle Gran Rey - 3 Calle el Carmen

Parking on the edge of the beach and the port.
magnificent place, near the brotherhood. unbeatable views!!!

title: (38870) Valle Gran Rey - 43I Lepanto

description: Newly constructed road to Playa de Alojera. Possibility of parking. The road is slightly sloping. Cubes under wheels are recommended. Very nice location. Cubes under wheels are recommended. Very nice location. An even more beautiful beach can be reached directly on the cliff by walk

title: (38686) - 2 Calle Tingara
description:
Place authorized for motorhomes for 72 hours.
This street is between 2 car parks with a 2.2m gauge,
it has long been closed to traffic.
Near the Guia Palace.
Nice paseo marítimo and natural pools

title: (38686) Alcalá - 3 Calle Carero
description: Galibo 2.20 Public and open parking on a dirt road. Very close to bathing ponds with showers (still open during the coronavirus period) and public baths.

title: (38686) Guía de Isora - Calle la Jaquita
title_short: (38686) Guía de Isora - Calle la Jaquita
description: Exclusive parking for motorhomes. It is a little steep and on a street with some traffic and without any view to enjoy, but it is close to the beach. The parking that was used before for the ACs near the promenade has now been prohibited. Without services

title: (38686) Alcalá - 33A Avenida los Pescadores
description: Tap from a pedestal

title: (38687) Guía de Isora - 6A Calle Rompeolas
description: Parking for camper 50m from the paseo maritime a little away from the village

title: (38687) Guía de Isora - 2A Avenida Altamar
description: Street parking close to the beach. parking possible also for long vehicles (7m ) as parking is in a line behind each other.

title: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 24 Calle Punta Negra
title_short: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 24 Calle Punta Negra
description: Parking in residential area sourranded by buildings near the beach. The rocky Playas are within 5min walking distance (2 of them). The main dark sand beach is at about 8 min walk.

title: (38687) Guía de Isora - 6 Calle Capirote
description:
Empty parking lot on a Saturday evening.
Permitted only for 24 hours.

title_short: (38687) Guía de Isora - 21 Carretera Alcala de General
description: Non-potable water with the paying machine 1euro/5minutes is the equivalent of approximately 42 liters of water. Not terrible but it helps!

title_short: (38687) Guía de Isora - 121P Urbanizacion Salinas de Fonsalia
description:
A beautifully landscaped, spacious site from this friendly community, perfect for about 10 campers
On gravel and slightly inclined
Beach shower near the beach. Supermarket and trash can

title: (38687) Guía de Isora - 2A Avenida la Gaviota
title_short: (38687) Guía de Isora - 2A Avenida la Gaviota
description: Wide leveled dirt esplanade. Useful as an alternative if the parking lot on Calle Punta Negra is occupied.

title: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 3 Calle Magnolia
description: Didn't stop here very long, however it seems like a very basic parking spot in a good location close to the seafront, at 10am in the morning it was little frequented and there were plenty of spaces. Views of los gigantes, especially if you go to the coast.

title: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 66 Calle Siete
description: A flat parking lot with some stones on the road but quiet. It is next to a lidl.

title: (38683) - 70A Calle Ocho
description: Parking with views and very quiet.

title: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 1 Avenida Jose Gonzalez Forte
title_short: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 1 Avenida Jose Gonzalez Forte
description: Ample level and paved parking lot, very close to the marina, Los Gigantes beach and restaurants. Quiet to sleep. On weekends and in the summer months it can be crowded during the day, but empty at night. No services

title: (38678) Adeje - Carretera Playa San Juan
description: Plenty of space to spend the night, we came with a caddy 2 nights and great. The access is a little shabby, but slowly, everything is fine. The swimming pool is very good. You must bring everything you need because there is nothing to buy.

title: (38687) Guíade Isora -
description:
Free public car parking near the beautiful Abama beach.
In the car parks at the end on the left there is more space to park your camper in the best possible way.
It is not a parking specifically for campers but you can easily spend a few nights there.
Holes available for emergency discharge of clean water only.

title: (38683) Santiago del Teide - 27 Calle Tabaiba
description: Parking space to enjoy the view of Los Gigantes. It is very steep.

title: (38678) Callao Salvaje - 6 Urbanizacion Callao Salvaje B
title_short: (38678) Callao Salvaje - 6 Urbanizacion Callao Salvaje B

title: (38678) Callao Salvaje - 1A Pasaje Valito Sau
description: Quiet area with playground for kids and few benches.

title: (38678) Adeje - 23 Calle la Tosca
description: Free parking near the beach

title: (38678) Adeje - 24 Avenida Adeje 300
description: Free Parking

name: Finca rural Nueva Vida
title: (38689) Finca rural Nueva Vida
description:
Finca in nature with parking option for one or more nights.

Payment will be made on arrival in cash.

Arrival time 5pm
Departure time 11am
Checkin before the schedule 
Departure after 11am

Please, call or send WhatsApp before coming to reserve a place

If you have a caravan that is larger than the width of our driveway and your mirrors do not close, you will not be able to enter

title: (38689) Chío - 2 Carretera a Cueva del Polvo
title_short: (38689) Chío - 2 Carretera a Cueva del Polvo
description: Simple esplanade on the side of a secondary road in a rural area. Quiet parking for one night. Nothing special but a good alternative for those who want more tranquility than parking on the coast between buildings and busy roads.

title: (38678) El Puertito - Unnamed Road
description: Popular spot on a rocky outcrop. Access only via a very bad dirt road, but somehow small and non-terrain vehicles also make it. On the way towards El Puertito there is a dirt road.

title: (38678) Adeje - 13 Avenida Adeje 300
description: Free parking, prohibited for motorhomes

title: (38678) Adeje - Calle el Puertito
description: Small friendly place with sea views and near a small beach.

title: (38678) Adeje - Carr. de Acceso al Puertito
title_short: (38678) Adeje - Carr. de Acceso al Puertito
description: Several esplanades where motorhomes are tolerated. Beautiful sea view and sunset

title: (38678) Adeje - 56 Avenida Playa Paraíso
description: You can park on the side of the road, but what's important here is a washing machine. The big machine costs seven euros with 15 kilos, the small nine kilos costs four euros.

title: (38678) Adeje - 66 Avenida Playa Paraíso
description: Free parking

title: (38480) Buenavista del Nte. -
description: Parking at Punta de Teno with fantastic sea views. No service! And be careful, access is only from 7 p.m. to 10 a.m., access during the day for private cars is prohibited!

title: (38684) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - DISA
description: Large Disa gas station where it is possible to fill the drinking water tank.

title: (38677) Adeje - 3 Calle Juan Afonso Placeres
description: Public parking place including amazing sunsets!! Safe and quiet. bins and fitness obstacles outside. really cool place to visit and stay for the night.

title: (38684) Tamaimo - 27 Carretera Puerto
description: Parking area along the road. Quiet at night. There is a cemetery a little down the road with water taps.

title: (38684) Tamaimo - 13 Calle Magarza
description: Very calm. Flat. 2 or more places. Beautiful view and start of the hike towards Los Gigantes.

title: (38689) Chío -
description: Nice spot to stay for the night. Just next to the road and enough flat space for 1 véhicule, but it’s ok for one night. The view is stunning as well as the sunset !

title: (38670) Costa Adeje - AV de los Acantilados
title_short: (38670) Costa Adeje - AV de los Acantilados
description: There is a parking lot on a relatively quiet street with sea and la Gomera. There are some hiking trails down to the beach. Here many dropouts settle, it is a peaceful and alternative place with nudist beach. No service.

title: (38680) Guía de Isora - 1-5 Avenida de la Constitución
title_short: (38680) Guía de Isora - 1-5 Avenida de la Constitución
description: 5 parking spaces for motorhomes, without services, with a slight slope. Very quiet area with sea views. Maximum 72 hours.

title: (38689) Chío - 16 Calle el Roquillo
description: Newly created municipal car park next to the cemetery. approx. 30 parking spaces. Flat, walled, lighted and almost empty on weekends. Access also possible with large motorhome. The usual barking dogs from the area, but otherwise quiet. No prohibition signs. Water fountain and view of the village in the cemetery next door. Visit to the old town of Chio, shopping and restaurants within walking distance.

title: (38489) Los Carrizales - 9 Calle Carrizal Bajo
description: On a dead end, steep descent and driveway, another small parking space for 1-2 vehicles. Last turning opportunity is given here. Please park in such a way that vehicles can still turn around. Wedges are definitely needed here to be able to stand up straight. Take everything with you again and keep the environment clean, so everyone can have more fun parking...

title: (38677) Adeje - 2A Diseminado Fuentita
description: Small secluded parking lot...

title: (38679) Adeje - 46 Paseo La Pedrera
description: Parking with swimming area for small motorhome

title: (38679) Adeje - 506 Avenida Barranco de las Torres
title_short: (38679) Adeje - 506 Avenida Barranco de las Torres
description: It's right next to the villa area and close to the hippie beach. Since parking on the street can be a bit tricky, here are a few more or less even spots for vans (might be too narrow for rv's). Gravel parking, nice view of the ocean, 20min walk to Hippie Beach.  During the day golfers park here.

title: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 3B Carretera General C 820
title_short: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 3B Carretera General C 820
description: Cemetery car park, very quiet because there are no major roads nearby.

title: (38489) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 26 Calle Carrizales Altos
title_short: (38489) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 26 Calle Carrizales Altos
description: Small roadside space for a couple of vans or a maximum of one camper. Amazing view. Local people recommend us not to stop over the weekend.

title: (38679) Costa Adeje - 8 Calle el Beril
description: Large parking lot near the beach. Also feasible for larger mobile homes (7.50m) Very quiet at night. Showers on the beach. Small supermarket with fresh rolls. Very good fish restaurant (La Torre del Mirador).

title: (38489) Masca - TF-436
description: Quiet place, the road to get there is steep and narrow. In the village there are bars and restaurants.

title: (38690) Arguayo - 41 Calle Candelaria
description: Recommended for campers, barbecue area with playground and drinking water, there are only 5 parking spaces for vehicles no longer than 5 meters

title: (38690) Santiago del Teide - TF-82
description: Cepsa station, with free water service. It also has gas.

title: (38489) Teno - Cam. el Vellado
description: Secluded and quiet place to spend the night and spend the day. Great views.

title: (38679) Costa Adeje - 25 Urbanizacion Poligono 8
description: Quiet place to show up and spend the night

title: (38489) Las Portelas - TF-436
description: Parking for day trips / hikes. Rather not suitable for overnight stays.

title: (38670) Adeje - 66 Avenida Barranco las Torres
description: BP gas station with free black and gray water emptying service. Drinking water filling. Bridge for washing tall vehicles.

title: (38690) -
description: Cherfe viewpoint. Great place with amazing view

title: (38679) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - C. Charfa
title_short: (38679) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - C. Charfa
description: Gas station

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - Urbanizacion Playa Fañabe, 3
description: Public toilets and showers are clean and large. Warm water and very good pressure in the showers. Opening hours are from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., showers only until 6 p.m.

title: (38489) Las Portelas -
description: The 4x4 is not absolutely necessary at the moment, but it is recommended. Small road with few alternatives for oncoming vehicles.

title: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 43 Calle Agustin Rodriguez Sanchez
title_short: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 43 Calle Agustin Rodriguez Sanchez
description: Parking near the visitor center in a quiet area with garbage cans and views of the Teide when the clouds are not there

title: (38489) Las Portelas -
description: 4x4 for real! It makes the hearts of all wheels beat faster. One of the few true four wheel drive places! There may be more in the back, but leave room for others to explore! You can't ride here without all-wheel drive! It's best to leave a review when you're there, so you can see if the place is busy. Get in busy on arrival and check note on departure and free up space as there is no chance to turn if someone is standing on top! Keep the environment clean and take everything with you so everyone can enjoy parking longer!

title: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 45 Avenida General Franco
title_short: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 45 Avenida General Franco
description: Parking in the river bed next to a picnic / playground, not an official parking lot. There is currently a construction site next door, but the volume is ok. Helpful if you want to go to Masca but don't want to torment your car up the mountain. It's not the prettiest place, but it serves its purpose. From the place the bus goes to Masca.

title: (38679) Costa Adeje - 7A Urbanizacion Jardines del Duque
title_short: (38679) Costa Adeje - 7A Urbanizacion Jardines del Duque
description: Dead end road in front of some houses. Locals live there and park there cars but it is a public street and public parking spots. Very calm .

title: (38690) Santiago del Teide - 68 TF-82
description:
Rest area with toilet and water taps.
Sleeping in the official parking places can be awful, since they are right next to the main road. On the other side of the rest area you can sleep in the river bed. Accessable from the road to Masca right at the end of Santiago del Teide. 
Totally quiet and covered.

title: (38650) Playa de la Américas - 36 Calle Arenas Blancas
title_short: (38650) Playa de la Américas - 36 Calle Arenas Blancas
description:
The only section of the streets around where they still did not put a forbidden sign for camper. only the side of the street with palmtrees! 
please don't stay longterm
please do not pee in public/ the palmtrees 
please no not let any trash around
better no chairs/tables. 
it's not a camping even each car is a camper on this side. 

the café next to it lets you use the washroom if you ask kindly but better support them buying your coffee as well once in a while. 

can be nice vibe within the camper community 

little bit uneven but nothing to worry about.

title: (38679) Costa Adeje - 6 Calle Helsinki
description: Parking space in a quiet area. A little traffic during the day.

title: (38679) Adeje - 1 Carretera General S/c Guia
description: DISA gas station , water filling 1 euro 30-40 litres , slow water flow

title: (38690) Santiago del Teide - Cam. Cementerio
description: Very quiet parking outside the city in the countryside (almond trees). Around the cemetery about 30 parking spaces on asphalt. No services but quiet, which is currently in short supply in Santiago del Teide. Bars and restaurants within 600 m walking distance.

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - 4 Urbanizacion Torviscas
description: Paved parking somewhat level, taking a walk you are in a tourist area with souvenir bars, restaurants, etc. We spend the night quietly, it is better to come in the evening, many free places

title: (38670) Adeje - 45 Avenida de la Constitución
description: Good launderette with machines. However, narrow access roads and few parking spaces.

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - 12 TF-481
description:
Nice parking lot spot near Siam Park for those who are planning to visit it during theirs stay at Costa Adeje.

Finding a free space during the day might be a bit difficult, but not impossible, therefore it's advisable to park after 18h00 (preferably at night) since it won't be very crowded.

You can stay the night with no problem but you might have your rest interrupted very early in the morning by the speeding cars passing along the motorway that is right next to the parking zone.

title: (38489) Buenavista del Nte. - Carretera A Teno Alto
title_short: (38489) Buenavista del Nte. - Carretera A Teno Alto
description: The neighborhood is quiet, you are collected and there are beautiful views. There is a sign that prohibits "Camping".

title: (38670) Adeje - 7 Avenida Palo Mayor
description: Free parking with views of the coast of Adeje and the ravine of hell at night very quiet, without services

title: (38688) Chirche - 6A Carretera Boca Tauce C 825
description: Parking at a viewpoint with a café

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - 36B Lugar Urbanizacion San Eugenio
title_short: (38660) Costa Adeje - 36B Lugar Urbanizacion San Eugenio
description: Parking similar to the one on the other side of the highway. a parking without more with enough places. can be tricky for large vehicles on some tight turns. there is a sign indicating maximum parking 12 hours

title: (38650) Arona - 5 Avenida Antonio Dominguez
description: Self service laundry. 4 washing machines, 2 dryers

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - 71 Avenida Austria
description: Ordinary parking lot. We have found 2 others nearby, both of them very difficult to drive in, almost crushed our caravan when riding there. Supermarket nearby.

title: (38660) Costa Adeje -
description: Dirt parking lot. uneven but acceptable. 12 minutes walk from the beach. Lots of shops around. next to a roundabout so slightly noisy but because of the near road very safe.

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - C. Islandia
description: Clean and modern laundromat with large machine for 19kg laundry. Advantage to other laundromats: there is plenty of parking nearby and a nice park to wait in.

title: (38670) Adeje - 8 Calle Concepcion Garcia Alvarez
description: Super cheap and quick laundry. self service possible as well as service available. washing detergent and disinfectant included. smells very good, dryer are drying very well and quick. no card payment possible only coins/notes.

title: (38650) Arona - 4 Calle las Madrigueras
description: Free parking close to supermarket, beach, town center.

title: (38660) Playa de la Américas -
description: BP gas station, water filling average flow

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking next to the Siam Park facilities. I haven't stayed overnight, I just left the AC all day to enjoy the water park. a lot of slope but it didn't affect the gas fridge. I just parked under a camera security because I had bicycles in the back and surfboards on the roof. when I came back I found everything in order

title: (38650) Arona - 1 Paseo El Salinero
description: A self-service laundry room, plain and simple.

title: (38660) Costa Adeje - 56 Avenida Francia
description: On-road parking between up market residential area and banana plantations.  Quiet at night buy cars drive past quite fast.  We stayed here the night before a day at Siam Park, 2 mins away.

title: (38480) Buenavista del Nte. - Ctra. Casablanca
description: Small parking lot on the street. Right now at the end of the cul-de-sac, road is closed on here!

title: (38489) Buenavista del Nte - 13 Calle Punta Teno
title_short: (38489) Buenavista del Nte - 13 Calle Punta Teno
description: Small driveway which is no longer used, ideal for a medium-sized camper.

title: (38480) Buenavista del Norte -
description: Super quiet place, with views of the mountains and the sea

title: (38650) Arona - 2 Calle Pizca
description:
A place for rather smaller vehicles because the employees of the nearby shopping center all park here, but we were lucky and had a very good night here
Right next to it: shopping at Mercadona, waste disposal, etc

title: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - Unnamed Road
description: Exclusive use parking for motorhomes next to the beach. The area has nothing nearby but it is beautiful and the beach is next to it

title: (38690) Las Barreras -
description: Parking space next to a nature information sign. No facilities. Nice view though.

title: (38650) Arona - 3 Calle Montaña Chica
description: Lavendera Laundromat

title: (38650) Arona - 4 Avenida de Chayofita
description: A large gravel site ideal for large vehicles, easy to reach and really fine for one night

title: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - Camino Casa las Arenas
title_short: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - Camino Casa las Arenas
description: Free parking spaces. Official motorhome parking. Close to the beach, trash nearby, otherwise no services. Quiet at night.

title: (38690) Las Manchas - Unnamed Road
description: Great place to stand here too. Possibly also accessible without a 4x4. However, nothing for large vehicles!

title: (38650) Los Cristianos - 53 Avenida Juan Carlos I
title_short: (38650) Los Cristianos - 53 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Parking until 72h. It is spread over two levels and each parking space is on the side of the road. The maximum parking time is not controlled, many occupy their places as they please. Beaches 15 minutes walk, trails, bikes, caraokes in all cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies. Near the port aboard the Isla de la Gomera. Gray and black unloading only, loading is no longer possible. In order not to move the vehicle, some fill up with water at the showers on the beach. Too bad there isn't a control for there to be some rotation.

title: (38650) Arona - Calle Caleta
description: Area for draining wastewater or toilets near the parking area. Black water point as indicated on the picture but it is just a hole in the ground covered with a sheet of metal. No grey water and no refill.

title: (38690) Valle de Arriba - Unnamed Road
description: Another place of many... The whole area is only suitable for small cars and small campers!

title: (38690) Las Manchas - TF-38
description: Parking spot discovered while driving past!

title: (38690) Las Manchas - Unnamed Road
description: Place on the edge of the forest. Discovered while passing by. Lanes lead here. Shady in the morning, sunny in the afternoon and in the evening!

title: (38690) Valle de Arriba - Unnamed Road
description: Small place in the middle of nowhere... 4WD is recommended only for small cars and small campers.

title: (38650) Los Cristianos - 43 Avenida Juan Carlos I
title_short: (38650) Los Cristianos - 43 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: It is steep parking space for about 12 motorhomes, limited to 72 hours of stay. Around 1200 meters to main Beach of Los Cristianos. Nereast pub about 300 meters.

title: (38650) Los Cristianos - 53 Avenida Juan Carlos I
title_short: (38650) Los Cristianos - 53 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: You park at the side of the road. They can fit vans up to 5.6 m long and not too wide. At the limit, bullying like many who get in the way, in this way the category will be increasingly accepted.

title: (38650) Arona - 14 Avenida Ámsterdam
description: To date possibility of parking and overnight stay. Dozens of places. Black water point nearby as indicated but it is just a hole in the ground covered with sheet of water. No grey water and no refill.

title: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - 1A Calle Antonio Díaz
title_short: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - 1A Calle Antonio Díaz
description: In the shade. Water source available.

title: (38435) Erjos - 3 Calle de D. Antonio Dorta Curbelo
title_short: (38435) Erjos - 3 Calle de D. Antonio Dorta Curbelo
description: Free public parking. Spacious and open air. Court and playground next door.

address.street: 3 Calle de D. Antonio Dorta Curbelo

title: (38650) Arona - 2 Avenida Amsterdam
description: Lateral parking in a quiet street Better at the end of the street that is going down or up, depending on the direction, Quiet and good area.

title: (38435) San José de Los Llanos -
description: Fantastic place surrounded by nature with views of Mount Teide and a wide variety of trails. You can have breakfast, lunch and dinner at the Caserío los partidos, a place worth tasting its gastronomy and beauty of its facilities. In winter have warm clothes, during the night it can exceed -0 degrees.

title: (38435) San José de Los Llanos - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38435) San José de Los Llanos - Unnamed Road
description: True 4x4! With lots of ground clearance! Difficult to access, reduction may be required when driving down...

title: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - Acceso Playa de Los Barqueros
title_short: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - Acceso Playa de Los Barqueros
description: Small space (max 2 vans) but very flat overlooking sea.  Excellent spot for watching sunset.  Walking access down to very rocky cove.  Very quiet.  We spent a fantastic night here, the only noise was the mowers of the next door golf course.  Perfect spot next to the little chapel.

title: (38435) San José de Los Llanos - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38435) San José de Los Llanos - Unnamed Road
description: No service not even 3G! Feasible with normal cars and small campers. Four-wheel drive is recommended for the further route...

title: (38688) Guía de Isora -
description: Camping area with or without motorhome free. Surrounded by pines. Do not park in the picnic area or you will be fined. You must apply for authorization online. This is to signal the time of arrival and departure. There are bathrooms, water and stove

title: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - 6 Calle Bajada Campo de Futbol
title_short: (38480) Buenavista del Norte - 6 Calle Bajada Campo de Futbol
description: Large gravel field at the football stadium, near the bus station. Practical for a bus tour to the most beautiful mountain village in Tenerife, Masca. No service.

title: (38632) Palm-Mar - 17 Avenida el Palm-Mar
description: Lavanderia Autoservico “Speed Queen” opening times: daily 0.8 am - 10 pm

title: (38435) San José de los Llanos - 9 Calle La Hoya
title_short: (38435) San José de los Llanos - 9 Calle La Hoya
description: Nice place in the forest, a lot of nature around and El Rico it’s an independent cultural association nearby with live concerts and very cheap food. There’s a parking area where you cannot stay the night.

title: (38470) Casco - 276 Diseminado los Silos
description: Very quiet place at the foot of a large rock wall. The water pipeline invites you to hike along the rock face. Space for about 4 cars. Warning: the entrance from the main road is very narrow. We just made it with our VW bus. Unsuitable for campers and caravans.

title: (38660) Adeje - Unnamed Road
description: Place with stunning views and very quiet, no services.

title: (38650) Arona - TF-655
description: Fuel pump or you can fill up with water but not drinkable rare on the island! 1 euro for 2 minutes. Convenient

title: (38615) Ifonche y Benitez - Unnamed Road
description: Near the starting sport of the screens, a small van or 4x4 passable path allows you to find a location for a vehicle, not very flat but easy to stall.

title: (38649) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1G Carretera Gral TF-28
title_short: (38649) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1G Carretera Gral TF-28
description: CEPSA gas station , water filling ( approx 50 litres )

title: (38652) Arona - 65 Camino Real Llano Azul
description: Good place to stay. Close to the highway. Still quite quiet and nice view.

title: (38435) El Tanque - Av. Venezuela
description: Nice parking area adiacent to the forest with tables and barbecues. Water fountains available.

title: (38649) Arona - 51 Camino Chichia
description: A larger car park, very accessible with a magnificent view

title: (38627) Arona - 6 Calle Acanto
description: Picnic area with BBQ area. Screw tap with a lot of pressure (the tank is filled immediately), located approx 5m from the area to stop the van (due to the length of the hose, ours arrived just right). Next to the road, a place to make a short stop and eat or refill water.

title: (38435) Los Silos - 7B Camino Real
description: Flat esplanade with plenty of parking to spend the night, quiet place.

title: (38640) Arona - 1 Avenida la Constitucion
description: Nice little parking suitable for small mobile homes. It has a fantastic view.

title: (38640) Arona - 2 TF-51
description: A small, natural parking lot with a spectacular view

title: (38479) -
description: Public picnic area with benches, grills and taps. Not really a place to stay.

title: (38688) Chirche - TF 38
description: True 4x4! This place is in the national park, you need a permit to stand here!

title: (38632) Guaza - 71 Carretera General
description: BP gas station , water 20c for 16liters

title: (38614) La Escalona - 5 Carretera General
description: A place with an amazing view ! The place is okay for 3 or 4 vans.

title: (38435) El Tanque - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place near the forest surrounded by trees. Unfortunately this beautiful square overlooking Mount Teide is full of rubbish! Caution broken glass! No service, please take everything back with you, or better yet, take more with you so that everyone can enjoy parking longer.
